Home
Giving + Support
Closer to the Center.
The best of Broadway. World-class performances. A sprawling campus with beautiful facilities. A mission to advance arts education. The Peace Center is proud to play host to all this and more as a center for culture and live arts in the Upstate. It is all made possible through the generous support of folks like you.
Help sustain your home for the performing arts.
Your contribution supports bold steps toward the Peace Center’s next chapter. By the end of 2025, the Peace Center will introduce two new music venues, expanding our campus to ten unique spaces and making way for a diverse lineup of programs and performances.
Ready to get closer to the center?
Donate Now
Here’s how you can support the Peace Center:
Become a Peacekeeper
Make a donation or recurring monthly gift and have a hand in cultivating community, culture, and arts education in the Upstate.
Become a Peacekeeper
Business + Foundation Support
Amplify your business’ commitment to community through a Corporate Partner gift.
Learn about Corporate Partnership
Planned Giving
Leave a lasting legacy on the performing arts in the Upstate by remembering the Peace Center in your will, estate plans, or by beneficiary designation.
Learn about Planned Giving
Do you have questions about giving?
Contact the Peace Center Development Office:
Phone:
864.679.9202
Email:
peacekeepers@peacecenter.org
Samantha Tucker,
Development Officer
Jami Wood Emory,
Major Gifts Officer
Mandy Oglesby,
Development Coordinator + Donor Concierge

Home
Contact Us
Contact Us
Thank you for your interest in the Peace Center. Your comments are appreciated. Have a question or comment that is not covered in our FAQ? Feel free to contact us using one of the methods below.
Live Chat
Open during
Box Office hours
, the Peace Center's live chat instantly connects you to a Peace Center representative. Click the chat icon below or
here
to get started.
By Email
For general inquiries, please email
contact@peacecenter.org
. If your message is intended for a specific recipient, please reference the
staff listing
and include their name in the email's subject line.
By Phone
Call us at
864.467.3030
and use the menu options to reach your desired party.
By Mail
101 West Broad Street
Greenville, SC 29601
For Box Office information and questions regarding ticketing,
please click here
.
For employment information and questions, please contact
hr@peacecenter.org
or 864.679.9291.
